attributes.action: Make Saint (St) Andrew's Day a National Holiday in Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
St Andrew's Day, i feel, needs to be made into a full Public/Bank Holiday for the population or Scotland.

It would be fair to say that other Patron Saints, such as, St George and St Patrick are far more celebrated, even in Scotland, than St Andrew is. 

It is time to give our National Patron Saint a full public/bank holiday.
